name: Merchant Galley
calculationsAnalysis: This building type is dynamically created by the import system to represent a merchant galley arriving with goods. It is not intended for player construction. Its primary function is to serve as a temporary holding point for imported resources.
shortDescription: A large trading ship used for importing goods. Appears temporarily at a designated water point.
fullDescription: The Merchant Galley is a dynamically generated building representing a large trading vessel that has arrived in Venice with imported goods. It serves as a temporary container for these resources before they are processed further. It is not a player-constructible building but a part of the import logistics.
flavorText: From distant shores, the galley arrives, its hold laden with the bounty of the world, a promise of Venetian prosperity.

soundDesign.ambientSound: Creaking wood, distant seagulls, gentle lapping of water
soundDesign.activitySounds: Sounds of cargo being present, occasional shouts of sailors if animated

seasonalEffects.storm weather: May be delayed or appear at a sheltered dock point
